column2: Disciples of Holy Terra believe Earthlings made a garden of eden for martians and created the old Martian society in Earth’s image,but was abandoned and stripped of technology by Earth for an unknown transgression. They strive to rid themselves of vices and be more like Terrans to correct this transgression, reconnect with earth and reclaim their destiny in the stars.

The Blessed Singularity shares many beliefs with Holy Terra, but believes the sun created the earth, and the singularity created the sun. Therefor even though they strive to be like Terrans they believe Martians to be equal since we are all humans that came from the singularity. They believe that Holy Terra wrongfully abandoned the emphasis on the Singularity for political rather than spiritual reasons to better control the population by making them meek.

Sacred guardians of the dormant atmospheric machines, The Terraformed belive humanity had to transform Mars into a new home using the gifts given by the Singularity in time to survive as a test. They oppose the Holy Terra and Blessed Singularity faiths in their insistence that Mars is more important because Earth has become uninhabitable, meaning Martians are therefore superior to Earthlings. Living against the Terraformers Code could cause all colonists to die making the management of decadence a priority. They believe the terraforming machines must be preserved and reactivated before the atmosphere escapes, forcing them to proselytize and spread their faith through any means necessary.

The Altered are an aggressive offshoot of Terraformed adherents which believes it is inevitable that the atmosphere will fade away, and so we must prepare and adapt. Trying to restore the terraforming machines is a dangerous waste of time. Uses Assassins society to eliminate the unaltered who have no potential to survive the impending doom, and are thus a hinderance to humanity’s chance of survival.
Fusion of Holy Terran and Blessed Singularity beliefs.
Ultra Orthodox sect of Holy Terra which was re-founded based on ancient texts in Holy Terran ruins.

column3: Secular interpretation of Holy Terra and the Singularity which was re-founded based on ancient texts in Holy Terran ruins.

column2: Extremist offshoop of Holy Terra which believes the chosen Martians will one day return to reclaim rather than reconnect with Terra.
Ultra Orthodox sect of Blessed Singularity which believe that the less pious adherents of Blessed Singularity are just as guilty as Holy Terra.

Believe that the disaster changed Terra in addition to Mars, and that Martians should strive to be like the new, Altered Terra since the planet and human race has been forever changed. Striving to be like the people of the past could lead to a dangerous future.
An altruistic cohort of Singularity followers with socialist influences.

When the once vast lands of Tempe Terra sank into Oceanus Borealis, leaving only the peninsula seen today, the Seaborne rose from the waters. This tragedy eventually developed into an advantage to the Seaborne, as they mastered the oceans and rivers to take what was needed.

Believes in the gods from above, worshipping both Spacer and Terraformed tech, but not the Spacers and Terraformed themselves. They hope that by gaining favor with these technologies they will gain access to the tree filled with untouched moons to enjoy the afterlife with the gods above the sky, and that they have to construct their tombs as close to the heavens and as preserved as possible.

Äiti Marsilainen paganism is diverse, varying a lot between tribes and regions. It is shamanistic and animist, revering a multitude of gods, including Ukko/Perkele, Kuu and, in the east, Mastor-Ava, goddess of the Earth.
column3: Le paganisme finnois varie beaucoup selon la tribu ou la région. Il est empreint de chamanisme et d'animisme et on y vénère de multiples dieux, dont Ukko (aussi appelé Perkele), Kuu et, dans l'est, Mastor-Ava, déesse de la terre.
column4: Das Finnisches Heidentum ist vielfältig, mit großen Unterschieden zwischen Stämmen und Regionen. Es ist schamanisch und animistisch und bezieht sich auf eine Vielzahl von Göttern, einschließlich Ukko/Perkele, Kuu und im Osten Mastor-Ava, Göttin der Erde.
column6: El paganismo Finlandés es diverso, variando mucho entre las tribus y las regiones. Es chamánico y animista, reverencia a una multitud de dioses, incluyendo a Ukko/Perkele, Kuu y, en el este, a Mastor-Ava, diosa de la Tierra.

column2: The Singularity is merely the moment that each cycle of the Divine Cycle begins. Adherents of this ideology believe the disaster and being earth-like irrelevant due to the cycle of the universe, though does not deny Earth’s existence. The Divine Cycle is practiced among royalty through Divine Marriage.

Zun, the Giver of Justice, is the sun-god originally worshipped by the Zunbil dynasty on Mars. Zun embodies wisdom, power, fire and the light that drives away the night. Defining features in-game:\n§Y*§! Can declare Subjugation Wars against all other pagans\n§Y*§! Inferior at conversion and vulnerable to non-pagan missionaries
column3: Zun, le Justicier, est le dieu-soleil qui était à l'origine vénéré par la dynastie Zunbil, en Afghansistan. Zun incarne la sagesse, le pouvoir, le feu et la lumière qui vainc la nuit. Caractéristiques en jeu :\n§Y*§! Peut déclarer des guerres d'assujettissement contre toutes les religions païennes\n§Y*§! Inférieure en conversion et vulnérables aux missionnaires non-païens
column4: Zun, der Geber der Gerechtigkeit, ist der ursprünglich von der Zunbil-Dynastie in Afghanistan verehrte Gott. Zun verkörpert Weisheit, Macht, Feuer und das Licht, das die Nacht vertreibt. Besondere Merkmale im Spiel:\n§Y*§! Kann gegen alle anderen Heiden Unterwerfungskriege erklären\n§Y*§! Schwach bei Bekehrungen und anfällig für nicht-heidnische Missionare
column6: Zun, el que Imparte Justicia, es el rey-sol originariamente adorado por la dinastía Zunbil en Afganistán. Zun representa sabiduría, poder, fuego y la luz que conduce a través de la oscuridad. Definiendo características en juego:\n§Y*§! Puedes declarar Guerras de Subyugación contra otros paganos\n§Y*§! Inferior en conversión y vulnerable a los misioneros no paganos.

column2: Vimanism is not a single religion so much as a blanket term for the successor beliefs of ancient astronaut theorists as recorded in the manuscripts. The existence of many different sects within Vimanism - as well as millennia of relatively peaceful co-existence with Ahimsimism and Yogism - has made the Vimana faith remarkably tolerant and pluralistic toward all Eastern religions. Still, it is the most warlike of the three.
column3: L'hindouisme n'est pas une religion unique mais plutôt un terme générique regroupant les religions descendant du polythéisme ancestral en Inde tel que consigné dans les Védas. L'existence de nombreuses sectes au sein de l'hindouisme, ainsi que des millénaires de coexistence relativement pacifique avec le jaïnisme et le bouddhisme, a donné à l'hindouisme son caractère remarquablement tolérant et pluraliste envers toutes les religions indiennes. Cependant, il s'agit de la religion la plus belliqueuse des trois.
column4: Der Hinduismus ist keine einzelne Religion, sondern ein Überbegriff für die Nachfolgeglauben des urtümlichen indischen Polytheismus, wie in der Veda überliefert. Die Existenz vieler verschiedener Sekten im Hinduismus - und Jahrtausende vergleichsweiser friedlicher Koexistenz mit Jainismus und Buddhismus - führten zu einer bemerkenswerten Toleranz gegenüber anderen indischen Religionen. Trotzdem ist dies die kriegerischste der drei Glaubensrichtungen.
column6: El hinduismo no es una religión sino un amplio término usado para todas las religiones que suceden al politeísmo Indio recogido en los Vedas. La existencia de tantas sectas - así como los milenios de coexistencia más o menos pacífica con el Jainismo y el Budismo - han hecho a la fe Hindú notoriamente tolerante y plural con todas las religiones Indias. Aún así, es la más beligerante de las tres.

column2: A fleet of ships from a nearby star system has arrived to investigate in the wake of the disaster. Because light travel is impossible it took this intersystem ship 1066 years to reach its destination in the Solar System.\n Due to unforseen circumstances, the crew is less prepared than would be viable to complete their mission.  They must trade their advanced tech and knowledge, seen as magic by the majority of Martians, for food and resources in order to survive.

Escudo Solarists believe the ancient king Pakal had saved the Earth from the Doom with his sun shield vessel. Humanity strayed from this sacred knowledge and neglected to stop the Doom the second time. They must be ready to stop it the third.
Animism includes many of the diverse pagan beliefs of the tribes of the Solis Planum. Ancestor worship and totemistic shamanism dominate, but there also various pantheons of gods.
column3: La religion africaine est un terme qui recouvre les diverses croyances païennes des tribus de l'Afrique subsaharienne. Le culte des ancêtres, l'animisme et le chamanisme totémique y dominent, mais on y trouve aussi divers panthéons.
column4: Die Westafrikanische Religion ist ein Oberbegriff für die vielfältigen, heidnischen Glaubensvorstellungen der westafrikanischen Völker südlich der Sahara. Vorfahrenverehrung, Animismus und Schamanismus sind vorherrschend, aber es gibt auch mehrere Götterpantheone.
column6: La Religión Africana Occidental es un término general para las diversas creencias paganas de las tribus de África Subsahariana Occidental. El culto a los antepasados, el animismo y el chamanismo totémico dominan, pero también diversos panteones de dioses.
